instructions: Go to iCloud.com , then sign in with your Apple ID. Open Find iPhone. Click All Devices, then click your Apple Watch.

Open Find My and tap or click your Apple Watch. Tap Activate in the Mark As Lost section. Tap Continue. Enter a phone number where you can be reached, then tap Next. Enter a message that you want to show on the watch screen. Tap Activate.
Sign in to iCloud.com with your Apple ID. Open Find iPhone. Click All Devices, then click your Apple Watch. Click Lost Mode > Stop Lost Mode, then click Stop Lost Mode again to confirm.
